page.title: 05Restoring Swineshead Church
page.content: At the moment the church is in the process of a major restoration programme, to date, the spire, south wall and roof have been completed. The villagers help in various ways with the church restoration. One way, was manual help by digging a trench around the church which was filled with gravel. This was done to help fight against rising damp. Other means are peoples support in fund raising events which are held throughout the year. All of these activities require lots of voluntary help and donations depending on the event.
